description: go-tour: add talk references to end of tour

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour

https://codereview.appspot.com/10670043/diff/1/tour.article

https://codereview.appspot.com/10670043/diff/1/tour.article#newcode835
tour.article:835: (click [[http://talks.golang.org/2012/concurrency.slide][here]] for the slides)
s/click/see/g

or, better, just:

([[http://...][slides]])

PTAL

https://codereview.appspot.com/10670043/diff/1/tour.article

Done.
